resources.string: NOT FOR NAVIGATION. NOT A FLIGHT INSTRUMENT. Do not use this app to measure or identify your altitude. Do not use this app to verify or "cross-check" the indications of any altitude or barometric pressure measurement device.

This app requires a pressure sensor in your Android device to measure atmospheric pressure and compute an altitude indication. It will run without a pressure sensor, in which case the experience will resemble using this app at sea level on the Standard Day.
Altimeter needle indicating hundreds of feet.
Altimeter needle indicating thousands of feet.
Altimeter needle indicating tens of thousands of feet.
Rotating dial indicating the altimeter setting.
Cap covering the end of the altimeter needle shaft.
